resources.string: The image below shows some of the better visual points at which you can see the lights, although the lights can be seen throughout a big stretch of the Blackpool beach as they go down the entire road.

The Blackpool illuminations where first switched on in 1879 and origanlly consisted of only 8 carbon arc lamps. The first modern day expreience was in 1912 when they switched on a promenade of 10000 lights to celebrate the royal families first visit.

Now the illuminations are described as the best free light show on earth and tens of thousands of people attend to see them switched on each year. Its become somewhat of a festavil with hosts like Topgear, Peter Kay and Dame Barbara Windsor switching the lights on. Theres usually a concert on afterwards with all sorts of different acts.
For your chance to win 2 tickets to the main stage event answer the following questions correctly.
